datamap-userpref-enable-ve: Enable the visual editor for data maps when it's out of beta
datamap-userpref-enable-ve-beta: Opt me into the map visual editor beta
datamap-vec-beta-notice: The visual map creation process is still in an early development stage
datamap-ve-limited-preview-notice: [PH] Certain features are disabled when previewing the map in the visual editor
datamap-error-cannot-open-ve-validation-:
Visual editor is unavailable due to errors in map's source code:
$1
Resolve the issues in the source editor first.
tag-datamaps-visualeditor-description: Edit made using the DataMaps visual editor
datamap-ve-group-id-cannot-modify: Currently renaming groups is not supported in the visual editor
datamap-ve-group-article-link-subtext: This can be overridden on individual markers.
datamap-ve-group-confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to permanently destroy marker group $1? This action is irreversible.
datamap-ve-tool-commit-edit-summary-subt: [PH] Describe your changes in a concise way
datamap-ve-dialog-beta-warning-text:
[PH] The visual editor is still in an early development stage; please report issues over Discord.

You may opt out from the beta in your [[Special:Preferences|preferences]].
